title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Short-Term Intensive Program for Enhancing Mathematical Problem-Solving Through Cognitive Load Management

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and understanding of elementary mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can decompose complex mathematical problems into three or more stages and establish step-by-step solution strategies.
Learners can efficiently allocate attention during problem-solving by applying cognitive load regulation techniques.
Learners can engage in self-directed learning using 15-minute microlearning modules in mobile environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
